text: Kiswarani (Aymara kiswara Buddleja incana,Yatiqirinaka Aru Pirwa, Lima, 2005 (Aymara-Spanish dictionary) -ni a suffix to indicate ownership, "the one with kiswara", hispanicized spelling Quishuarani) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru, about high. It is located in the Apurímac Region, Antabamba Province, Sabaino District, and in the Aymaraes Province, Caraybamba District. Kiswarani lies southeast of Pisti. == References == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Apurímac Region
title: Kiswarani
